chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)

Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jason Mitchel Daane in court for Sergio Netro Martinez.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Minutes filed.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jason Mitchel Daane in court for Sergio Netro Martinez.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Victim also present in court. Defense is asking for one additional status. Court grants request. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant in court in custody via video with attorney Jason Daane. ADA Herrmann appears for the State of Wisconsin. Spanish interpreter Saul Arteaga appears. Attorney received discovery, needs more time to complete investigation. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez in court, in custody by video. Attorney Mackenzie Renner for Attorney Jason Daane. Interpreter St John previously sworn. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Not guilty plea entered by counsel and trial reserved. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

records.addlTxt:
3:00 PM (64-06) Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez appeared by video with Interpreter Bruce Goodman, previously sworn by the clerk..  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin, Andrew Herrmann  in court. Attorney Jason Mitchel Daane in court for Sergio Netro Martinez. 
Matter was scheduled for a preliminary hearing but the defendant wishes to waive his right to a preliminary hearing. 
Response by Counsel and defendant to Court's questions.
Court finds defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives his right to a preliminary hearing and binds the defendant over.
State is requesting 30 days.

Arraignment scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

3:05PM (64-06) Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez not in court.  Attorney Samuel Berg in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Jason Mitchel Daane in court for Sergio Netro Martinez. 
Attorney Daane is requesting more time to meet with his client. Time limits are waived and is requesting a Waiver of Preliminary Hearing and Arraignment
No objection from the State.

Adj. 3:06PM
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.addlTxt:
Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez in court, in custody. Attorney Mackenzie Renner appeared for Attorney Jason Daane. Interpreter Saul Arteaga previously sworn. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Reading of complaint waived. No victims in court. Rights given and hearing set within time period. Minutes filed.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Cash bond filed. Defendant refused to sign.

Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH S.M.M. (dob 2/7/2011), M.D.M. (dob 9/14/1975), S.A.M. (dob 6/20/1983). NO CONTACT WITH ANY OTHER MINORS. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant. 

22-1741

Andrew Herrmann appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Sergio Netro Martinez in court, in custody by video with Attorney Jason Daane for bond purposes only. Interpreter Arteaga appeared for the defendant. Case called at 1:33 PM. Record by the State as to probable cause. Discussion. Bond set. Minutes filed.
Hearing scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
